markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Violent Unleash](/Feats.aspx?ID=3667) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Mindshift" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=428" />
<trait label="Occult" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=120" />
<trait label="Psychic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=430" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 25</row>

**Trigger**
You [Unleash your Psyche](/Actions.aspx?ID=1222).

</column>

---

The force of your mind unleashing itself wracks your enemies with a violent shockwave. You deal 2d6 force damage to all creatures in a 20-foot emanation, with a [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save. This explosion is taxing, making you [stunned 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36).

 At 5th level and every 2 levels thereafter, the damage increases by 1d6.
name: Violent Unleash
